title: 1/2 FEE on a 4 bed in Oak Square CATS OK Laundry, Pantry, Porch,
posting_body: Right in the heart of Oak Square.
There's a public park and a dog park nearby (sorry no dogs though).
My favorite neighborhood in Mass- I live here too!
There's another 4 bedroom apt just like this one in the same building for $2800 as well.
If we schedule a tour we'll see both of them.
The back porch is huge and there's a small front yard.
Coin op laundry in basement as well as room for storage.
Clean and updated 4 bedroom, 3 family home.
This unit features a front & back porch, updated floors & bathroom, and laundry in the basement.
Unit has street parking and is conveniently close to numerous coffee shops, parks, and food options.
